xml.brief: Get the list of allowed geocache report reasons

desc.p: This method returns an installation-dependent list of the allowed values for the reason parameter of services/caches/reports/submit.

opt.name: langpref
opt.p: Pipe-separated list of ISO 639-1 language codes. This indicates the order of preference in which language will be chosen for the title and explanation return values.

returns.p: An array of dictionaries, each describing an allowed geocache report reason and having the following structure:

ul.li: reason - the string to be inserted as reason parameter to services/caches/reports/submit,
title - the localized, user-readable title of the reason,
explanation - a localized, comprehensive explanation of the reason.

returns.p: The list of allowed reasons may change at any time.
